actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 402 of title 23, United States Code, and section 103 of the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966, relating to schoolbus safety.

summary.text: Provides that the Secretary of Transportation shall not approve any State highway safety program which does not contain a comprehensive schoolbus safety program. Requires the Secretary to establish, within six months after the enactment of this Act, appropriate Federal motor vehicle standards for schoolbuses.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 402 of title 23, United States Code, and section 103 of the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966, relating to schoolbus safety.
